title: What older songs could be a number one on the hits list nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Basically nothing pre 1997, artists like Britney, Eminem, Destinys Child if they just appeared now could still be huge but have you listened to the charts recently they are very narrow on genre is if you arent pop,rap,hip hop or a drippy singer songwriter you will have no hope.of getting close to number one.
